titleStmt.title: The saints support, set out in a sermon preached before the Honourable House of Commons assembled in Parliament. At a publick fast, 29. Iune, 1642. By William Gouge.
titleStmt.author: Gouge, William, 1578-1653.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by G. M. for Joshua Kirton at his Shop in Pauls Church-yard at the Signe of the white Horse,

notesStmt.note: Order to print on verso of first leaf.
Running title reads: A sermon preached at the late fast before the Commons House of Parliament.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his Shop in Pauls Church-yard at the Signe of the white Horse
